credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Herman Miller Summer Picnic, July 25, 1981
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Silkscreen with lacquer finish on wove paper
description: On brown background, orange potatoes, light yellow cheese, and red tomato sauce appear as vaguely naturalistic organic shapes. Inscribed on top: "herman miller summer picnic july 25, 1981".
name: Poster
